content.rendered:
What is SEO?

Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is essentially online marketing. The significance of obtaining and executing the proper procedures when developing an SEO campaign will make or break your websites’ reputation. There are numerous options when it comes to choosing whose guidelines to follow. Although all major search engine websites mandate the similar requirements, our choice engine is Google. No particular reason for the choice, other than Google has proven to revolutionize the way we view the Internet today! There are a few steps to follow when developing your SEO campaign.

Here at DG Studio, some of those steps include:

  • Google Analytic Setup – Google Analytics is implanted into your website to recognize your audience by analyzing your online traffic. Understanding your visitors will allow you to better serve and please the people, in turn creating an enhanced traffic flow adding to your business’ success.
  • Google Webmaster Tools – Google Webmaster Tools is great for a couple of reasons. First, it provides you with access to comprehend how users are finding your site. And secondly, it analyzes and provides advise on potentially hazardous issues within your site, in turn offering a better representation by Google.
  • Full Website Audit & Corrections – A complete inspection of your website is conducted to ensure all proper SEO guidelines are followed and any/all corrections are made.
  • Industry Research – An extensive research plan is implemented into your field, analyzing your competitors success rate. By doing so, we understand what has been working for your competitors, in turn allowing us to further enhance and develop your website to reach total and complete success.
  • Keyword Research – A thorough and analyzed research is conducted to utilize the proper keywords into your online search result, gaining additional traffic growth.
  • Content Optimization – Once all the research is completely conducted and analyzed, we optimize your site content, ensuring SEO guidelines are followed.
  • Additional Offered Services – There is numerous services offered if DG Studio is chosen to execute your SEO campaign. With a custom developed marketing strategy, reputation management, directory submission and social outreach, our proven experience and reputation will showcase your online success.

With a better knowledge as to the requirements and importance of a carefully thought-out SEO campaign, you should understand that choosing the right strategic partner is just as important. DG Studio partners with the client, understanding what the client’s expectations are. By doing so, we execute a successful campaign every-time attaining customer satisfaction and more business!
